intro_text: Hey, I'm Robin, a full-stack developer with a passion for IT and a love for learning. I work hard to craft seamless digital experiences, bringing ideas to life with every line of code. Let's create something amazing together!
about_text: Hey there, I'm Robin‚Äîa full stack developer sculpting the digital landscape. I thrive on crafting seamless user experiences, from front-end dazzle to back-end efficiency. Dive into the world of code with me, where each line holds the potential for magic and innovation! Let's embark on a coding journey together, turning ideas into reality one line at a time. üíª‚ú®
education_point_1: Studying at a technical high school boosted my skills in programming and IT.
education_point_2: I learned languages like Python, Java, and C++ to create apps.
education_point_3: Practical projects helped me apply theory and build real solutions.
education_point_4: I gained experience in networking and security through labs.
college_point_1: At university, I focused on IT, artificial intelligence, and game development.
college_point_2: Learned machine learning and how to work with AI algorithms.
college_point_3: Game dev courses taught me design, graphics, and optimization.
pied_piper_point_1: Designed and built responsive React components used in live projects.
pied_piper_point_2: Worked with the dev team to enhance existing features and apps.
pied_piper_point_3: Gained team experience through code reviews and collaboration.
pied_piper_point_4: Learned the full development cycle from idea to deployment.
narawebs_point_1: Founded Narawebs to create tailored web and e-commerce solutions.
narawebs_point_2: I provide modern, user-friendly websites for various clients.
narawebs_point_3: Focus is on responsive design and smooth user experience.
narawebs_point_4: Every project is custom-built to match client goals and growth.
text_pro: Following projects showcase my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
experience_brief: X years of proven industry experience
projects_intro: My projects cover a wide range of skills‚Äîfrom elegant static websites to advanced database systems and interactive 3D apps. Each project reflects my focus on clean code, responsive design, and user experience.
narawebs_description: A business presentation for my web agency NaraWebs. A modern, fast, and responsive website where I offer my services and showcase my skills through a real product.
sheel_description: A custom-built app that creates and prints personalized cards based on user input, with a connected database for record management.
striking_description: A comprehensive website for a sports club, including a registration system, training management, and admin/member dashboards.
pension_description: A clean, elegant website for a small guesthouse. Offers clear information and fast contact for bookings.
3d_description: An interactive app that allows users to upload 3D models and send them to a print queue. Includes frontend + hardware integration.
fyzio_description: A visually clean and functional site for a physiotherapy center with booking, service info, and responsive UI for all users.
